DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether transjugular intrahepatic portosystemic shunt (TIPS) with 10-mm covered stent is associated with lower shunt dysfunction in comparing TIPS with 8-mm covered stent in cirrhotic patients with at least one episode of variceal bleeding.
DOC.brief_title: TIPS With 8- OR 10-mm Covered Stent for Preventing Variceal Rebleeding
